notes: Modern high-rise apartment on 22F with excellent natural light and contemporary finishes including recessed lighting, built-in cabinetry, and a spacious walk-in closet. The unit appears clean and well-maintained with a bright open-plan living/dining area. For baby safety, the balcony visible in image 1 would need childproofing, and the large windows throughout require attention; furniture has mostly rounded edges which is positive.
